nodes.documentation:
@dev Extension of {ERC20} that implements a basic ERC20 staking
with incentive distribution.
nodes.name: ERC20Stakes

nodes.documentation: @dev A method for a stakeholder to create a stake
nodes.name: createStake

nodes.documentation: @dev A method for a stakeholder to remove a stake
nodes.name: cancelStake

nodes.documentation: @dev A method to allow a stakeholder to withdraw his rewards.
nodes.name: withdrawStake
_createStake

nodes.documentation:
@dev internal method for a stakeholder to hold a stake.
@param stakeholder Stakeholder address
nodes.name: _holdStake

nodes.documentation:
@dev internal method for a stakeholder to remove a stake.
@param stakeholder Stakeholder address
nodes.name: _removeStake
stakeOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev A method to the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.
@return uint256 The aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.
nodes.name: totalStakes
isStakeholder

nodes.documentation:
@dev A method to add a stakeholder.
@param stakeholder The stakeholder to add.
nodes.name: _addStakeholder

nodes.documentation:
@dev A method to remove a stakeholder.
@param stakeholder The stakeholder to remove.
